scripts.setup: pnpm install && git submodule update --init --recursive --remote && cd strudel && git checkout main && git stash && git pull && cd .. && git commit -a -m 'Updated Strudel from origin.'
scripts.build-repl: cp -r strudel-addons/csoundac strudel/packages/ && python3 patch-strudel.py && cd strudel && npm run setup && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build-repl && vite build && cp -rf strudel/website/dist/* dist/ && rm dist/index.html && python3 patch-dist.py && ls -ll dist
scripts.deploy: cp -rf dist/* docs/ && git add --force docs && git commit -a -m 'Deploying to GitHub pages.' && git push
